description:
Sanji is tormented by the idea of becoming a cruel Germa warrior like his siblings and torn between being strong or being humane as he is now. When he makes up his mind, he asks Zoro the ultimate favor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For Luffy - Sanji and Zoro`s Oath
Für Ruffy – Sanjis und Zorros Schwur
Luffy no Tame ni: Sanji to Zoro no Chikai
Pour Luffy. Le serment de Sanji et Zoro !
ルフィの為に サンジとゾロの誓い
